data.title: San Stanislao Institute, Šentvid District Podcast
data.meta_description: In a small part of Ljubljana, there is a building that tells a long and complex story. It is the Institute of St. Stanislaus, founded at the end of the 19th century thanks to the idea of Bishop Anton Bonaventura JegliÄ.
